    • Constructor Detail

      • CcddServerPropertyDialog

        CcddServerPropertyDialog(CcddMain ccddMain,
                         boolean useActiveDatabase,
                         CcddConstants.ServerPropertyDialogType dialogType,
                         java.lang.String errorMessage)
        Server properties dialog class constructor
        Parameters:
        ccddMain - main class
        useActiveDatabase - true to use the active database; false to use the default database. This is only used when opening the database after changing the login credentials
        dialogType - database dialog type: LOGIN, PASSWORD, DB_SERVER, or WEB_SERVER
        errorMessage - message to display following an unsuccessful login; null if no error has occurred or this isn't the login dialog

      • CcddServerPropertyDialog

        CcddServerPropertyDialog(CcddMain ccddMain,
                         CcddConstants.ServerPropertyDialogType dialogType)
        Server properties dialog class constructor
        Parameters:
        ccddMain - main class
        dialogType - database dialog type: LOGIN, PASSWORD, DB_SERVER, or WEB_SERVER

    • Method Detail

      • isPasswordSet

        protected boolean isPasswordSet()
        Check if the password was successfully set in the Password dialog
        Returns:
        true if the password is set in the Password dialog; false if Cancel was selected or the dialog type is not Password

      • initialize

        private void initialize(java.lang.String errorMessage)
        Create the server properties dialog
        Parameters:
        errorMessage - message to display following an unsuccessful login; null if no error has occurred or this isn't the login dialog

      • addLoginPanel

        private boolean addLoginPanel(javax.swing.JPanel selectPnl,
                              java.awt.GridBagConstraints gbc,
                              javax.swing.border.Border border)
        Add the user and password fields to the specified panel
        Parameters:
        selectPnl - JPanel to which the fields are added
        gbc - reference to the GridBagConstraints governing the panel
        border - border with which to surround the input fields
        Returns:
        true if at least one user exists in the server or if the user can be entered manually

      • verifySelection

        protected boolean verifySelection()
        Verify that the dialog content is valid
        Overrides:
        verifySelection in class CcddDialogHandler
        Returns:
        true if the input values are valid
